Metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3604 affecting package libdb for versions less than 5.3.28-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2017-3604 affecting package libdb for versions less than 5.3.28-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libdb is earlier than 5.3.28-7, affected by CVE-2017-3604
